references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of deep learning on point clouds, introducing the PointNet architecture which is widely used and built upon.

references.paper_title: Dynamic graph cnn for learning on point clouds
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in introducing the use of dynamic graph convolutional networks for point cloud processing, leading to many subsequent improvements in the field.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking robustness of 3d point cloud recognition against common corruptions
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset (ModelNet40-C) specifically for evaluating the robustness of point cloud recognition models under various corruptions, creating a standardized way to compare robustness methods.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking and analyzing point cloud classification under corruptions
references.reason: This paper provides another important benchmark dataset (ModelNet-C) that is used widely for evaluating the robustness of point cloud models against common corruptions, influencing many related works.

references.paper_title: How does frequency bias affect the robustness of neural image classifiers against common corruption and adversarial perturbations?
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical and empirical insights into the relationship between frequency bias in image classifiers and their robustness against common corruptions and adversarial attacks, which the current paper extends to 3D point clouds.
